text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 42 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
invariably let's find out what it means
and how you can use this word in your
daily conversation invariably there are
some things that keep happening on a
regular basis or sometimes certain
things are constant that means they
don't change such as human habits
invariably
basically means something that always
happens or something that is constant
and happens without any exception for
example it invariably rains in the month
of June that means every year it always
rains in June in short you use the word
invariably when discussing things that
happen all the time or just don't change
meri invariably visits her grandmother
every Saturday this means she regularly
visits her grandmother every Saturday so
when an action is repeated regularly you
use the word invariably in other words
when you do something on a regular basis
without any change you are doing it
invariably as the word invariably
indicates that an action is happening
constantly it is an adverb alright now
that you know what invariably means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
example one many people invariably start
each morning with a hot cup of tea or
coffee example till even though Mary is
on a diet she invariably lands up
heating something sweet at night example
3 the price of gold is invariably on the
rise example 4 in spite of repeated
warnings from the boss John is
invariably late for the meetings example
5 Peter invariably gets drunk in every
party example 6 due to Rose his
efficient work she invariably receives
compliments from her boss for all her
projects example 7 the experienced boxer
invariably wins every boxing match
example 8 whenever William wears a white
shirt he invariably lands up spilling
something or the other while eating
example 9 Sam invariably forgets to
charge his mobile phone getting in touch
with him is really difficult
example 10 jutsu Gallas positive
approach towards life she has invariably
been happy over the years
you
